categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Sith Lord of Gairm was a Sith Lord who was befriended by the Jedi Master Vonkhel. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the antiques dealer Antron Bach remembered the story of the unlikely friendship while trying to reassure himself about approaching a downed starfighter, which he thought might contain a pirate or another dangerous individual.

The Sith Lord of Gairm was first mentioned in "The End of History", a short story written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 154 in 2014. The character's name, species and gender were not revealed in the story.
